abstrac: "From raw data to polished images, I bring precision and creativity to every project - Over 11 years of experience in data entry, processing, conversion, and image editing."
bio: I am an 11+ years experienced data entry professional and image editor with a strong attention to detail and a commitment to accuracy. Throughout my career, I have worked with a wide range of clients, from small businesses to large corporations, helping them manage and organize their data and images effectively. I specialize in data entry, data processing, data conversion, image editing, and formatting. My skills and experience make me a reliable and efficient resource for any project, and I am dedicated to delivering high-quality results that meet my clients' needs and exceed their expectations.

As a freelancer offering 30 hours per week, my work terms would include:

Availability: I will be available for 30 hours per week, during the agreed-upon schedule.

Communication: I will maintain clear and timely communication with clients via email, phone, or messaging platforms.

Deadlines: I will adhere to project deadlines and ensure that all work is delivered on time.

Payment: I will expect timely payment for my services, as agreed upon in the contract.

Revisions: I will be open to revisions and ensure that all work meets or exceeds the client's expectations.

Confidentiality: I will maintain confidentiality and protect client information.

Scope of Work: I will clearly define the scope of work and ensure that both parties agree upon the work to be performed.

Overall, my goal is to provide high-quality work and a positive experience for my clients, while maintaining a mutually respectful and professional relationship.

As an Editing and Publishing graduate, my editing skills are extensive, specialising in developmental/structural editing, and line-reading/basic proofreading. My previous experience has been with both…

commnet: Great working with you again, Casey!
Casey is a great proofreader who respects an author's style. I totally recommend her to any indie authors out there who are on a budget.
for Proofreading new edition of Book 2
Once again, it was a pleasure working with Casey. Her editing skills are spot on, methodical, but still respect my voice as an author.

Casey did the proofreading of my 5th novel and I would recommend her to anyone. She respected my writing style, while helping me to improve the narrative by suggesting solutions and new ways of expressing myself. Her project management skills are also great. She kept me informed of her progress alon …Read More
Casey did a great job, providing me with plenty of good edits and suggestions. Thanks!!
